quizz_info_1: Verapamil is used for the treatment of hypertension. It is on the World Health Organization's List of Essential Medicines. A recent study showed that patients taking regular oral administration of the drug were producing a higher level of their own insulin, thus limiting their need for insulin injections.
quizz_info_2: For more details on this synthesis, see: J. Am. Chem. Soc. 2005, 127, 15824–15832. For more information about the use of verapamil for diabete 1 treatment, see: Nature Medicine 2018, doi: 10.1038/s41591-018-0089-4
